title: Peanut butter cheesecake with chocolate peanut sauce and sautéed bananas
ingredients: 300ml/11fl oz double cream, whipped until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed
175g/6oz dark chocolate, cut into small pieces
4-6 baby bananas, peeled and cut in half lengthways
40g/1½oz chocolate-coated honeycomb, cut into slices, to serve
